content.question: Write a statement that uses the Math method random to generate a random number between 0 and the length of the first name. Write another statement that uses the Math method random to generate a random number between 0 and the length of the last name minus 2.

frqParts.text: Write a statement that uses the Math method random to generate a random number between 0 and the length of the first name. Write another statement that uses the Math method random to generate a random number between 0 and the length of the last name minus 2.

skill.text: 2.C: Write program code involving procedural abstractions.
